original_title: Les enfants du 209, rue Saint-Maur, Paris Xe
overview: After selecting a building at random in a Jewish neighborhood in Paris, French director Ruth Zylberman meticulously reconstructed its community of inhabitants during the German occupation.  What results is the spellbinding 209 RUE SAINT-MAUR, an experimental historiography that tells the emotional story of lives uprooted and destroyed under the Nazis.
title: The Children of 209 Saint-Maur Street
